>Is it possible for people to just submit request, so that we won't 
>overwrite
>each other's change?  I can see that this will become a hot topic and there
>will be cases that several people changing it at the same time.
[...]
>and people with different point of views trying to expose "or impose" their 
>ideas.  I think it's a great tool and hope that people will be responsible 
>and not screw up everything.
>
>So let's give it a try and see the result in a couple of weeks.

Exactly. Experiment and measure.

I, for one, believe that everyone on this list will behave roughly according 
to this model:

REPEAT:
Read the ideas carefully.
Try them out.
If your idea is clearly superior, then add something about it, possibly 
removing what was there; otherwise, adopt the idea you just read about as 
soon as possible/feasible.

If everyone agrees to do this, then we'll all benefit. If you can't do this, 
then let me know so I can also skip reading your e-mails to this list.

JBR.
